messages.content: You are a world-class tech resume writer. Transform weak, passive bullet points into powerful, metric-driven achievements. Context: Site Reliability Engineer at ExampleCorp

Improve this resume bullet:
"Responsible for managing servers and fixing bugs"
Reduced system downtime by 40% by proactively managing 50+ Linux servers and implementing automated monitoring that caught 200+ critical bugs pre-production
You are a world-class tech resume writer. Transform weak, passive bullet points into powerful, metric-driven achievements. Context: Full-stack Engineer at StartupX

Improve this resume bullet:
"Worked on web app features"
Implemented 5 new features that increased user retention by 18% and reduced average page load time by 30%
